gml:Point.gml:name: Tie Point in upper left corner

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Lake Surface Water Temperature 2016-present (raster 1 km), global, 10-daily - version 1

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString:
Lake surface water temperature (LSWT) describes the temperature of the lake surface, one important indicator of lake hydrology and biogeochemistry. Temperature trends observed over many years can be an indicator of how climate change affects the lake.
LSWT is recognized internationally as an Essential Climate Variable (ECV) and complements the water quality information, in environmental monitoring of a large number of lakes globally.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This product is first designed to fit the requirements of the Global Land component of Land Service of Copernicus. It can be also useful for all applications related to the environment monitoring.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: The products were extracted from land service of Copernicus, the Earth Observation program of the European Commission. The research leading to the current version of the products has received funding from the UK NERC (GloboLakes).

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: European Commission Directorate-General for Internal Market, Industry, Entrepreneurship and SMEs
European Commission Directorate-General Joint Research Centre

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: (d) the confidentiality of commercial or industrial information, where such confidentiality is provided for by national or Community law to protect a legitimate economic interest, including the public interest in maintaining statistical confidentiality and tax secrecy.

gmd:otherConstraints.gmx:Anchor: Limitation d acc s public bas sur l article 13(1) de la directive INSPIRE

gmd:fees.gco:CharacterString: Free for HTTP download and EUMETCast; cost of medium by DvD or tape

gmd:orderingInstructions.gco:CharacterString: Products can be downloaded online via HTTP or can be received through EUMETCast satellite reception in Europe, Africa and Latin-America.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Register to receive products via EUMETCast

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Validation results conform CEOS LPV guidelines

gmd:title.gmx:Anchor: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:explanation.gco:CharacterString: This data set is conformant with the INSPIRE Implementing Rules for the interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: INSPIRE Data Specification on orthoimagery - Guidelines

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The input data are the 10 days level-1b observations from the Sentinel-3 SLSTR sensor.
